description: Schema for VSF GCCG connection parameters
title: GCCG Connection Parameters schema

gccgVersion.description: Version of the GCCG API. Format is XX.XX

tMin.description: Minimum latency of the Workflow Step in milliseconds.

tMax.description: Maximum latency of the Workflow Step in milliseconds.

tMinAccumulated.description: Accumulated minimum latency of the Workflow path up to this Workflow Step, in milliseconds. Can change but the change is disruptive to the Workflow timing while the Workflow adapts.

t99Accumulated.description: Accumulated maximum latency of the Workflow path up to this Workflow Step, in milliseconds. Can change but the change is disruptive to the Workflow timing while the Workflow adapts.
